posts.title: LSL
posts.mobiledoc: {"version":"0.3.1","atoms":[],"cards":[],"markups":[],"sections":[[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"You know \"浪摄流\", this was the short name."]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"I spends much of my time walking at the street like a dog for food to taking photography this years. but sometime not just for catch, it was a way get my thoughts straight. "]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"I had tried to build a team for expanding street photography, but not yet, maybe time past, I would met some gay whom fit me up."]]]]}
posts.html:
You know "浪摄流", this was the short name.

I spends much of my time walking at the street like a dog for food to taking photography this years. but sometime not just for catch, it was a way get my thoughts straight.

I had tried to build a team for expanding street photography, but not yet, maybe time past, I would met some gay whom fit me up.
posts.plaintext:

I had tried to build a team for expanding street photography, but not yet, maybe

posts.title: Reststream
posts.mobiledoc: {"version":"0.3.1","atoms":[],"cards":[],"markups":[],"sections":[[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"A project for rest api with stream tech."]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"Above all, I consider joining \"p2p video module\", \"p2p transfer tech\", \"Blockchain\" and \"big x-nat trans-through\" together. but not finish yet."]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"I think drop-center and server-less maybe the feature within public internet."]]]]}
posts.html:
A project for rest api with stream tech.

Above all, I consider joining "p2p video module", "p2p transfer tech", "Blockchain" and "big x-nat trans-through" together. but not finish yet.

I think drop-center and server-less maybe the feature within public internet.
posts.plaintext:
A project for rest api with stream tech.

Above all, I consider joining "p2p video module", "p2p transfer tech",
"Blockchain" and "big x-nat trans-through" together. but not finish yet.

I think drop-center and server-less maybe the feature within public internet.

posts.title: Ful dot rest
posts.mobiledoc: {"version":"0.3.2","atoms":[],"cards":[],"markups":[],"sections":[[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"Project \"ful dot rest\""]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"as you know, dns resolve step was a kind of like this way:"]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"Root Servers ->  Verisign's root servers -> TLD Name Server -> Domain's Name Server..."]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"in this way \"ful dot rest\" should be pronounce \"rest dot ful\"."]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"with this logic that you should call it \"rest dot ful dot api\" if add a subdomain \"api\" before."]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"That's all what the ful dot rest."]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"?? separate front-end complete cms function testing."]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"?? add time-based one time password."]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"++ update login-get-post-logout with no jq and sdk.  - 4/21/2020"]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"++ update login-get-post-delete-update-logout. -4/27/2020"]]],[1,"p",[]]]}
posts.html:
Project "ful dot rest"

as you know, dns resolve step was a kind of like this way:

Root Servers ->  Verisign's root servers -> TLD Name Server -> Domain's Name Server...

in this way "ful dot rest" should be pronounce "rest dot ful".

with this logic that you should call it "rest dot ful dot api" if add a subdomain "api" before.

That's all what the ful dot rest.

?? separate front-end complete cms function testing.

?? add time-based one time password.

++ update login-get-post-logout with no jq and sdk.  - 4/21/2020

++ update login-get-post-delete-update-logout. -4/27/2020
posts.plaintext:

posts.title: Animation
posts.mobiledoc: {"version":"0.3.1","atoms":[],"cards":[],"markups":[],"sections":[[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"Animation included traditional animation and computer-generated imagery mainly."]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"As before, the original animation was found as traditional animation, which kind of like a frame-by-frame animation. And Full animation was the top level of traditional animation. but sadly, no one care about these now, just story."]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"By paying most of my time in sketch for self-learn this year, I was more determined to making independent Full animation films, including independent music and prototype-sketch."]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"That's how I face animation."]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"(Traditional animation include Full animation, Limited animation, Rotoscoping and Live-action/animation.)"]]],[1,"p",[]]]}
posts.html:
Animation included traditional animation and computer-generated imagery mainly.

As before, the original animation was found as traditional animation, which kind of like a frame-by-frame animation. And Full animation was the top level of traditional animation. but sadly, no one care about these now, just story.

By paying most of my time in sketch for self-learn this year, I was more determined to making independent Full animation films, including independent music and prototype-sketch.

That's how I face animation.

(Traditional animation include Full animation, Limited animation, Rotoscoping and Live-action/animation.)
posts.plaintext:
Animation included traditional animation and computer-generated imagery mainly.

As before, the original animation was found as traditional animation, which kind
of like a frame-by-frame animation. And Full animation was the top level of
traditional animation. but sadly, no one care about these now, just story.

By paying most of my time in sketch for self-learn this year, I was more
determined to making independent Full animation films, including independent
music and prototype-sketch.

That's how I face animation.

(Traditional animation include Full animation, Limited animation, Rotoscoping
and Live-action/animation.)

posts.title: Blog
posts.mobiledoc: {"version":"0.3.1","atoms":[],"cards":[],"markups":[],"sections":[[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"from blogger -> opera blog -> msn live space -> google site -> wordpress -> tumblr -> sina -> 163 ->baidu hi -> qing -> lofter -> cnblogs  ..."]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"Either by project drop or blocked or bad environment or ads, I drop above."]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"I just can't believe that I even came back to primitive local txt or even paper handwritten for noting, but in fact, that's the true."]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"And. I had had tried github pages years before. with a very low speed for opening one page. I drop. "]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"But now, I was proud that I came back to github. Thanks for jsDelivr."]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"So the blog in my half life. "]]]]}
posts.html:
from blogger -> opera blog -> msn live space -> google site -> wordpress -> tumblr -> sina -> 163 ->baidu hi -> qing -> lofter -> cnblogs  ...

Either by project drop or blocked or bad environment or ads, I drop above.

I just can't believe that I even came back to primitive local txt or even paper handwritten for noting, but in fact, that's the true.

And. I had had tried github pages years before. with a very low speed for opening one page. I drop.

But now, I was proud that I came back to github. Thanks for jsDelivr.

So the blog in my half life.
posts.plaintext:
from blogger -> opera blog -> msn live space -> google site -> wordpress ->
tumblr -> sina -> 163 ->baidu hi -> qing -> lofter -> cnblogs  ...

Either by project drop or blocked or bad environment or ads, I drop above.

I just can't believe that I even came back to primitive local txt or even paper
handwritten for noting, but in fact, that's the true.

And. I had had tried github pages years before. with a very low speed for
opening one page. I drop. 

But now, I was proud that I came back to github. Thanks for jsDelivr.

So the blog in my half life.

posts.title: WoTHub
posts.mobiledoc: {"version":"0.3.1","atoms":[],"cards":[],"markups":[],"sections":[[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"Project web of things hub."]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"In simple explain, the iot(Internet Of Things) meaning the device layer, the wot(Web Of Things)meaning the control and callback layer."]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"This was the half of wothub project meaning."]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"In another half, wothub should bring a big surprise."]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"Try and guess!"]]],[1,"p",[[0,[],0,"To be continue."]]]]}
posts.html:
Project web of things hub.

In simple explain, the iot(Internet Of Things) meaning the device layer, the wot(Web Of Things)meaning the control and callback layer.

This was the half of wothub project meaning.

In another half, wothub should bring a big surprise.

Try and guess!

To be continue.
posts.plaintext:
Project web of things hub.

In simple explain, the iot(Internet Of Things) meaning the device layer, the
wot(Web Of Things)meaning the control and callback layer.

This was the half of wothub project meaning.

In another half, wothub should bring a big surprise.

Try and guess!

To be continue.
